page.title: 05Technology In Thorpe Hesley
page.content: For{energy}we use electricity,coal and gas.Much of the technology in the home needs electricity.In the last twenty years there has been a lot more electrical appliances in the home to make life easier.Many houses have fridge-freezers,blenders,deepfat fryers,electric knives and kettles. There are also washing machines,tumble dryers and electric fan cookers. Micro waves cut down the cooking time.In the living room we have electric fires television,radios,stereos,computers and videos.some people rent their audiovisual eqipment from companies.You can also rent videos of lots of feature films for one pound. The most popular films are Conan the Destroyer,Final Terror and Romancing The Stone.
